JavaScript.ScriptParam: cmd, p1, p2, p3, p4
JavaScript.Name: JScr__cfwSendAPI
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var sResult;
 if(window['IDEAMAPI'] != null && window['IDEAMAPI'].API != null) {
 sResult=IDEAMAPI.API(cmd, p1, p2, p3, p4);
 
 return sResult;
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__cfwStartSet
JavaScript.ScriptData:
value=AnyToBool(value);
 if(value){
 if(AnyToBool(this._cfwStartV()) == false)
 { 
 CallUserProcAsync("_AsyncLoadFirstPage",this.Name(),page.Name(),10,"","");
 
 this._cfwStartV(true);
 }
 }else{
 this._cfwStartV(false);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__cfwInitSet

value=AnyToBool(value);
 if(value){
 if(AnyToBool(this._cfwInitV())){
 return;
 }
 this._cfwInitBuehneSet(true);
 this._cfwSendAPI("SetPageContainer",page.Name(),page.Buehne());
 this._cfwInitV(true);

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnBeforePageReady
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(AnyToBool(EQ(GetAuthorMode(),1))){
 createMAPIifNotExists();
 }else{
 createMAPI();
 }
 page._cfwSendAPI('', page._SavePageStatusSession(), '', '');
 page._regModules();
 this._cfwInit(true);
 if(this['_addEventListeners']!=null){
 this._addEventListeners();
 }
 
 if (navigator.userAgent.match(/chrome/i))
 page._UserAgent('Chrome');

 if (navigator.userAgent.match(/iPad/i)||navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone/i))
 {
 page._UserAgent('iOS'); 
 var app = document.URL.indexOf( 'http://' ) === -1 && document.URL.indexOf( 'https://' ) === -1;
 if(!app)
 jQuery('div#CFW_S_Tablet').addClass('iOS');
 }
 
 if(AnyToBool(Variablen.System.Phone()))
 jQuery('div#CFW_S_Tablet').addClass('phone');
 
 if(AnyToBool(Variablen.System.Desktop()))
 jQuery('div#CFW_S_Tablet').addClass('desktop'); 
 
 if(AnyToBool(NE(GetAuthorMode(),1))) 
 ElementQueries.init();
 
 
 page.PrjSettingsObj._getProjectSettings();

 
 if(GetAuthorMode() != 1)
 {
 WriteToConsole("RestartSetting: "+page.PrjSettingsObj._RestartSetting()); 
 if(page.PrjSettingsObj._RestartSetting() == 1)
 { 
 page._LastVisitedPage(page._cfwSendAPI("GetLastVisitedPageName"));
 if(page._LastVisitedPage() != "") 
 externalStartPage = page._LastVisitedPage();
 }
 if(page.PrjSettingsObj._RestartSetting() == 2)
 { 
 page._LastVisitedPage(page._cfwSendAPI("GetLastVisitedPageName"));
 if(page._LastVisitedPage() != "") 
 { 
 page._showDlgBox();
 return;
 }
 }
 }
 
 if(AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","System","Desktop","",""))!=true||AnyToBool(page._enableStartPanel())==true)
 return;
 
 this._cfwStart(true);

JavaScript.Name: JScr__regModules
JavaScript.ScriptData:
IDEAMAPI.ExecuteFunctionOnComponents(page.Name(),page.Modules(),"doReg");
 IDEAMAPI.ExecuteFunctionOnComponents(page.Name(),page.Modules(),"OnAllModulesReady");
 
 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_disablePopUpMode', page.Name(), '_disablePopUpMode,');
 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_enableNavigation', page.Name(), '_enableNavigation,');
 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_disableNavigation', page.Name(), '_disableNavigation,');
 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_enableNaviNext', page.Name(), '_enableNaviNext,');
 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_disableNaviNext', page.Name(), '_disableNaviNext,');
 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_enableNaviBack', page.Name(), '_enableNaviBack,');
 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_disableNaviBack', page.Name(), '_disableNaviBack,');

 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_enableOK', page.Name(), '_enableOK,');
 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_disableOK', page.Name(), '_disableOK,'); 
 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_enableLoesung', page.Name(), '_enableLoesung,');
 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_disableLoesung', page.Name(), '_disableLoesung,');
 
 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_endofAudio', page.Name()+'.'+page.btPlayAudio.Name(), '_endofAudio,');
 page._cfwSendAPI('RegisterAPI', '_disableAudioBT', page.Name(), '_disableAudioBT,');
 
 page._cfwSendAPI('regNaviBtn', 'Ok', page.Name()+'.'+page.btOK.Name());
 page._cfwSendAPI('regNaviBtn', 'Loesung', page.Name()+'.'+page.btSolution.Name());
 
 page._cfwSendAPI("AddEventListener",page.Name());
 page.i_addEvent("onMobileDialogClose","OnClosePopup");
 
 if(AnyToBool(NE(GetAuthorMode(),1)))
 page._loadCSSfiles();
 
 page._makePageStatus(GetCMIValue('cmi','suspend_data'));

 var w=page.txtPN.OffsetLeft();
 else

 if(page.mbtText.cssDisplay()!="none"&&AnyToBool(jQuery(page.mbtText.obj).hasClass("hidden"))==false)
 count++;
 if(page.mbtGloss.cssDisplay()!="none"&&AnyToBool(jQuery(page.mbtGloss.obj).hasClass("hidden"))==false)

 if(page.mbtHelp.cssDisplay()!="none"&&AnyToBool(jQuery(page.mbtHelp.obj).hasClass("hidden"))==false)

TIdeaHTMLViewer.Name: txtPN
TIdeaHTMLViewer.HTMLText: x / y

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnNewPage
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var pgN=page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name');
 var x=GetAutoPageNr(pgN); 
 this.Visible(AnyToBool(x!=nmIgnore));
 if (x==nmIgnore){
 
 this.Visible(false);
 return;
 } 
 
 x=Max(AnyToInt(x),1);
 var y=Max(1,GetAutoPageCount(pgN));
 this.HTMLText(AnyToStr(x)+ " / " + AnyToStr(y));
 
 this.Visible(true);

JavaScript.Name: JScr__initPosition
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var s=this.obj.style;
 s.left="0px";
 s.right="0px";


 
 page.Stage.WidthType(3);
 page.Stage.obj.style.left="0px";
 page.Stage.obj.style.width="100%";
 
 jQuery(this.obj).css("overflow-y","auto");
 
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("mScrollable");

JavaScript.Name: JScr__init
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var S; 
 this._steps(y);
 if(y>AnyToInt(this._compCount()))
 this._compCount(y);
 jQuery(page.presNaviInner1.obj).css("margin-left","0"); 
 this.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 page.PCountBack.cssDisplay("none");
 jQuery(page.PCountBack.obj).removeClass("dis");
 page.PCountBack.Enabled(true);
 page.PCountNext.cssDisplay("none");
 jQuery(page.PCountNext.obj).removeClass("dis");
 page.PCountNext.Enabled(true); 
 var x=0;
 var PCount;
 var comp=AnyToObject("presNaviInner1");
 while(x<this._compCount())
 {
 x++;
 S=AnyToStr(FindObject("PCount"+x));
 if(S == "@0")
 PCount = DuplicateVertex("PCount1","",comp,"PCount"+x); 
 else 
 PCount = AnyToObject("PCount"+x);
 if(x>y)
 PCount.cssDisplay("none");
 else
 PCount.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 jQuery(PCount.obj).removeClass("past");
 }
 if(page.presNaviInner1.OffsetWidth()>page.presNaviInner.OffsetWidth())
 {
 page.PCountBack.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 page.PCountNext.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 jQuery(page.PCountNext.obj).addClass("dis");
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnClick
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var x=jQuery(page.presNaviInner1.obj).css("margin-left");
 x=AnyToInt(StrReplace(x,"px",""));

 var offset = page.PCount1.OffsetWidth();
 var m = jQuery(page.PCount1.obj).css("margin-left");
 m = AnyToInt(StrReplace(m,"px",""));
 offset += m;
 m = jQuery(page.PCount1.obj).css("margin-right");
 m = AnyToInt(StrReplace(m,"px",""));
 offset += m;
 offset = (offset*3);
 
 if(x<=(-offset))
 x=AnyToInt(x+offset);
 else
 x=AnyToInt(0);
 jQuery(page.presNaviInner1.obj).css("margin-left",x+"px");
 
 jQuery(page.PCountBack.obj).removeClass("dis");
 page.PCountBack.Enabled(true);
 
 if(x>=0)
 {
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 this.Enabled(false);
 return;
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnMouseMove
JavaScript.ScriptData:
return;

 if(this._start()!=-9999)
 {
 var newLeft=this.OffsetLeft()+(newX-this._start());
 var newLeft=newX-this._start();
 WriteToConsole(newLeft);
 jQuery(this.obj).css("margin-left",newLeft+"px");
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnClick
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var x=jQuery(page.presNaviInner1.obj).css("margin-left");
 x=StrReplace(x,"px","");
 var y=AnyToInt(page.presNaviInner1.OffsetWidth()-page.presNaviInner.OffsetWidth());
 y=AnyToInt(x)+y;

 var offset = page.PCount1.OffsetWidth();
 var m = jQuery(page.PCount1.obj).css("margin-left");
 m = AnyToInt(StrReplace(m,"px",""));
 offset += m;
 m = jQuery(page.PCount1.obj).css("margin-right");
 m = AnyToInt(StrReplace(m,"px",""));
 offset += m;
 offset = (offset*3);

 if(y>=offset)
 x=AnyToInt(x-offset);
 else
 x=AnyToInt(x-y);
 jQuery(page.presNaviInner1.obj).css("margin-left",x+"px");
 
 jQuery(page.PCountNext.obj).removeClass("dis");
 page.PCountNext.Enabled(true);
 
 if(y<=offset)
 {
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 this.Enabled(false);
 return;
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__checkPos
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(page.presNaviInner1.OffsetWidth()<=page.presNaviInner.OffsetWidth())
 {
 page.PCountBack.cssDisplay("none");
 page.PCountNext.cssDisplay("none");
 return;
 }
 page.PCountBack.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 page.PCountNext.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 var l = PC.length;
 if(l==7) 
 var i = AnyToInt(StrCopy(PC,7,1));
 else
 var i = AnyToInt(StrCopy(PC,7,2));
 var S=AnyToStr(FindObject("PCount"+(i+1)));
 if(S == "@0") 
 var PCount = AnyToObject(PC);
 else 
 var PCount = AnyToObject("PCount"+(i+1)); 
 
 var offset = PCount.OffsetWidth();
 var m = jQuery(PCount.obj).css("margin-left");
 m = AnyToInt(StrReplace(m,"px",""));
 offset += m;
 m = jQuery(PCount.obj).css("margin-right");
 m = AnyToInt(StrReplace(m,"px",""));
 offset += m;
 
 var x=AnyToInt(page.presNaviInner.OffsetLeft()+page.presNaviInner.OffsetWidth());
 var y=PCount.OffsetLeft();
 if((offset*i)>page.presNaviInner1.OffsetWidth()) return;
 if(y==0) return;
 if(y>=x)
 {
 offset = offset*(i+1); 
 offset = offset-page.presNaviInner.OffsetWidth(); 
 var offset2 = page.presNaviInner1.OffsetWidth()-page.presNaviInner.OffsetWidth();
 if(offset2 <= offset) 
 {
 jQuery(page.presNaviInner1.obj).css("margin-left","-"+offset2+"px");
 jQuery(page.PCountBack.obj).addClass("dis");
 page.PCountBack.Enabled(false); 
 }
 else 
 jQuery(page.presNaviInner1.obj).css("margin-left","-"+offset+"px");
 jQuery(page.PCountNext.obj).removeClass("dis");
 page.PCountNext.Enabled(true);
 }
 var ox=AnyToInt(page.presNaviInner.OffsetLeft()); 
 if(y<ox)
 {
 offset = offset*(i-1); 
 jQuery(page.presNaviInner1.obj).css("margin-left","-"+offset+"px");
 jQuery(page.PCountBack.obj).removeClass("dis");
 page.PCountBack.Enabled(true);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__enablePopUpMode
JavaScript.ScriptData:
page._hideNavigationMenue();
 page.NavbarLeft.cssDisplay("none");
 page.NavbarCenter.cssDisplay("none");

 page.NavbarRight.obj.style.width="100%";
 page.btHome.cssDisplay("none");
 page.btRepeat.cssDisplay("none");
 page.btExit.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 jQuery(page.NavbarRight.obj).css("text-align","center");
 jQuery(page.btExit.obj).css("float","right");
 
 page.btMenu.Visible(false);
 page.txtPN.Visible(false);
 page.btMore.Visible(false);
 
 page._PopUpMode(true);
 
 if(page.btPlayAudio.Enabled()==true)
 {
 if((StrPos("act",page.btPlayAudio.cssClass()))==0)
 page.btPlayAudio.OnClick();
 }
 page._CallerPage(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'));

JavaScript.Name: JScr__showGlossarTip
JavaScript.ScriptData:
jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnSolution.obj).css("display","none"); 
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnNext.obj).css("display","none");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnAgain.obj).css("display","none");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnClose.obj).css("display","inline-block");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoContainerBild.obj).css("display","none");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoTitel.obj).removeClass("mar_l40");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoText.obj).removeClass("mar_l40");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBTContainer.obj).removeClass("mar_l40");
 
 if(glTerm!="")
 {
 gvCFW.InfoTitel.Caption(glTerm);
 gvCFW.InfoTitel.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 }
 else
 gvCFW.InfoTitel.cssDisplay("none");
 
 iComp=AnyToObject("InfoText"); 
 gvCFW.InfoText.Caption(glText);
 gvCFW.InfoText.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 gvCFW.Info.Left(0);
 gvCFW.Info.Top(0);
 gvCFW.Info.Visible(true);
 gvCFW.Info.cssDisplay("inline-flex");
 
 jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").removeClass();
 if(glTitle==""||glTitle==undefined) glTitle="Glossar";

 ShowMobileDialog(gvCFW.Info,glTitle);
 jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").removeClass();
 jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").addClass("commentbox");
 jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").addClass("hotspotbox"); 
 jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").addClass("noPopupPic");

JavaScript.ScriptParam: duration, currentTime
JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnPlayingTime
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(currentTime>0)
 { 
 var sek=Math.floor(duration % 60);
 var sSek="";
 if(sek<10)
 sSek="0"+sek;
 else
 sSek=sek;
 var min=Math.floor(duration / 60);
 sek=Math.floor(currentTime *1000);
 
 var tmpl=page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Template');
 tmpl=tmpl.toLowerCase();
 
 if(StrPos("audiopresentation",tmpl)!=0)
 page._cfwSendAPI('ExecuteFunctionOnComponents',page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'),'page','_checkStep',[sek]);
 
 if(StrPos("pdf_elearning",tmpl)!=0)
 { 
 var audioControl = page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_AudioControl');
 if(audioControl == 1)
 page._cfwSendAPI('ExecuteFunctionOnComponents',page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'),'page','_checkStep',[sek]);
 }
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnNewPage
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(GetAuthorMode() == 1)
 {
 page._disableNavigation(); 
 page._disableAll();
 return;
 }
 else
 page._showCover(); 
 
 if(AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_Testmode')))
 { 
 page._hideNavigationMenue();
 page._hideGlossar();
 }
 else
 {
 page._enableNavigation();
 }

 
 
 if(page.PrjSettingsObj._NoTestCourseCompleted() == 1) 
 { 
 var c, x, i;
 var S, sIsChapter;
 c = AnyToInt(page.MenuTree.TreeViewItemCount());
 x = 0;
 var count=0;
 for(var st = x; st < c; st++)
 {
 sIsChapter = AnyToStr(page.MenuTree._IsChapter(st));
 if(sIsChapter == '1')
 count++;
 else
 {
 S = AnyToStr(page.MenuTree.getPagenameForIndex(st));
 if( AnyToBool( page._cfwSendAPI("getPageState", S)) )
 {
 count++;
 }
 }
 }
 var proz=(DIV(MULT(count,100),c)); 
 if(proz>=100)
 {
 if((page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","AICCResult","","") != 0) && (page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","AICCResult","","") != 2))
 page._cfwSendAPI("writeVar","Global","AICCResult","1","");
 }
 }
 
 if(page._SpeakerTextMode()==true)
 {
 setTimeout(function(){pages[page.Name()]._showSpeakerText()}, 100);
 }
 
 var sPage = page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name','','',''); 
 if(sPage != page.PrjSettingsObj._MainMenuPage()) 
 page._LastActivePage(sPage); 

 if(AnyToBool(EQ(page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","System","AICCMode","",""),1)))
 {
 var S=IDEAMAPI.PagesStatus(); 

 doLMSSetValue('cmi.suspend_data', S);
 if(page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","AICCResult","","") == 3)
 doLMSSetValue('cmi.core.lesson_status','incomplete');
 if(page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","AICCResult","","") == 1)
 doLMSSetValue('cmi.core.lesson_status','completed');
 if(page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","AICCResult","","") == 0)
 doLMSSetValue('cmi.core.lesson_status','passed');
 if(page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","AICCResult","","") == 2)
 doLMSSetValue('cmi.core.lesson_status','failed');
 doLMSCommit();
 }
 
 CallUserProcAsync('_hideCover',page.Name(),page.Name(),500,'','');

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnNewPage
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(page.PrjSettingsObj._ProgressPageCount() == 1)
 { 
 var x=AnyToInt(page._cfwSendAPI("PageIndex"));
 var y=AnyToInt(page._cfwSendAPI("PageCount"));
 }
 else
 { 
 var x=AnyToInt(page._cfwSendAPI("GetAbsPageIndex"));
 var y=AnyToInt(page._cfwSendAPI("GetAbsPageCount"));
 }
 
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(GetAuthorMode(),1)))
 var prozent=100;
 else
 var prozent=(DIV(MULT(x,100),y));
 this.Width(prozent);
 this.Visible(true); 
 
 var sPage = page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name','','','');
 if(sPage == page.PrjSettingsObj._MainMenuPage())
 this.Visible(false);

JavaScript.Name: JScr_rmp
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var len=node.childNodes.length;
 var i=len-1;
 var ch;
 for(; i>=0; i--){
 ch=node.childNodes[i];
 if(ch.hasChildNodes())
 page.rmp(ch);
 else{
 if(ch.tagName=="TIdeaPage"){ 
 node.removeChild(ch);
 }
 }
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_makeChapterMenu
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var xMenu=jQuery.parseXML(MenuXML);
 var xSeiten=xMenu.firstChild;
 var xChapter=xSeiten.getElementsByTagName("TStdOrganization")
 for(var i=0; i<xChapter.length; i++)
 {
 var xSeite=xChapter[i].getElementsByTagName("TIdeaPage"); 
 var seite="";
 if(xSeite.length>0)
 {
 seite=xSeite[0].getAttribute("Name");
 }
 xChapter[i].setAttribute("Name",seite);
 }
 page.rmp(xMenu.childNodes[0])
 if (xMenu.xml) 
 {
 var Xml2String=xMenu.xml;
 }
 else
 {
 var Xml2String= serializeNode(xMenu);
 }
 return Xml2String;

JavaScript.Name: JScr_ThemeSet
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(typeof(value)=="undefined")
 return;
 
 var stil;
 this._Theme(value);
 var x=0;
 while(x<12)
 {
 x++;
 
 if(x==1)
 stil="midBlue";
 if(x==2)
 stil="greenBlue";
 
 
 this.cssClass(StrReplace(this.cssClass(),stil,""));
 }
 
 if(value!=-1)
 {
 if(value==0)
 stil="";
 if(value==1)
 stil="midBlue";
 if(value==2)
 stil="greenBlue"; 
 
 this.cssClass(AnyToStr(this.cssClass()+" "+stil));
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_ASEventSet
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(typeof(value)=="undefined")
 return;
 
 
 if (IAL._PrjName()!="p_respo_2")
 return;
 
 
 if (value==asePageLoadInEditor){
 
 LoadCSSfile(expandmetavarEx("$(DesignPfad)$CSSV1/icomps.css","Variablen"));
 
 LoadCSSfile(expandmetavarEx("$(DesignPfad)$CSSV1/iflex.css","Variablen"));
 
 LoadCSSfile(expandmetavarEx("$(DesignPfad)$CSSV1/iproject.css","Variablen"));
 }
 
 
 if (value==asePageUnLoadInEditor){
 
 removejscssfile(expandmetavarEx("$(DesignPfad)$CSSV1/iflex.css","Variablen"),"css");
 removejscssfile(expandmetavarEx("$(DesignPfad)$CSSV1/iproject.css","Variablen"),"css");
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__checkPageForPool
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var iIndex;
 var arrTestPages=[];
 var s=this._TestPool();
 arrTestPages=s.split(',');
 
 if (isVarUndefined(sPage))
 sPage='';
 if ((sPage!='')&&(sPage!=this._TestStartPage())){
 iIndex=arrTestPages.indexOf(sPage);
 }
 return iIndex;

JavaScript.Name: JScr__GetNextFromPool
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var iIndex;
 var sResult, s;
 var arrTestPages=[];
 sResult='';
 s=this._TestPool();
 arrTestPages=s.split(',');
 
 if (isVarUndefined(sPage))
 sPage='';
 if ((sPage!='')&&(sPage!=this._TestStartPage())){
 iIndex=arrTestPages.indexOf(sPage);
 
 if ((iIndex<0)&&(arrTestPages.length>0)){
 sResult=arrTestPages[0];
 }else{
 if (iIndex<arrTestPages.length-1)
 sResult=arrTestPages[iIndex+1];
 } 
 }else{
 
 if (arrTestPages.length>0)
 sResult=arrTestPages[0];
 } 
 
 return sResult;

JavaScript.Name: JScr__GetPrevFromPool
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var iIndex;
 var sResult, s;
 var arrTestPages=[];
 sResult='';
 s=this._TestPool();
 arrTestPages=s.split(',');

 if (arrTestPages.length==0)
 return sResult;
 
 if (isVarUndefined(sPage))
 sPage='';
 
 if ((sPage!='')&&(sPage!=this._TestStartPage()))
 {
 iIndex=arrTestPages.indexOf(sPage);
 if (iIndex>0)
 sResult=arrTestPages[iIndex-1];
 } 

 return sResult;

JavaScript.Name: JScr__LoadExercise
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var prData=[];
 var i;
 var s;
 
 s=this._PageResults(); 
 
 
 if (s!="")
 prData=s.split('##');
 
 
 
 for(i=0;i<prData.length; i++) {
 
 s=prData[i];
 
 exData=s.split('*');
 if (exData[0]==sName){
 
 return s;
 i=prData.length;
 } 
 } 
 
 return '';

JavaScript.Name: JScr__ResetTest
JavaScript.ScriptData:
this._TestPool('');
 this._TestStartPage(sPage);
 this._TestEndPage('');
 this._PageResults('');
 this._TestPageCount(0);

 
 if(this._SCORMMode()==1)
 page._cfwSendAPI("writeVar","Global","AICCResult","2","");
 page._cfwSendAPI("writeVar","Global","_SCORMMode",this._SCORMMode(),"");
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","System","AICCMode","",""),1)))
 { 
 if(this._SCORMMode()==1) 
 doLMSSetValue('cmi.core.lesson_status','failed'); 
 doLMSSetValue("cmi.core.score.raw",0); 
 doLMSCommit();
 }
 
 page._cfwSendAPI("writeVar","Global","Points","","");

JavaScript.ScriptData:
var prData=[];
 var exData=[];
 var i;
 var s;
 var bSaved=false;
 
 
 s=this._PageResults(); 
 
 if (s!="")
 prData=s.split('##');
 
 
 for(i=0;i<prData.length; i++) {
 s=prData[i];
 
 exData=s.split('*');
 if (exData[0]==sName){
 
 prData[i]=sEx;
 bSaved=true;
 i=prData.length;
 } 
 } 
 
 if (bSaved==false){
 prData.push(sEx);
 s=prData.join('##');
 
 }else{
 s=prData.join('##');
 
 }
 
 
 this._PageResults(s);

JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(AnyToBool(EQ(GetAuthorMode(), 1))) {
 PreviewPage._showmessage();
 return;
 }
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(this._IsChapter(this.Index()), 1))){
 return;
 }
 var S = AnyToStr(this.getPagenameForIndex(this.Index()));
 
 var nav = page.PrjSettingsObj._NavigationSetting();
 
 if(nav == 0) {
 page._cfwSendAPI("Jump", S);
 }
 
 if(nav == 1 || nav == 2) {
 var PS = page._cfwSendAPI("getPageState", S); 
 if(PS == 1 || PS == 2)
 page._cfwSendAPI("Jump", S);
 else {
 var i=this.Index();
 i--;
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(this._IsChapter(i), 1))) {
 while(AnyToBool(EQ(this._IsChapter(i), 1)) && i > 0) 
 i--;
 } 
 var S = AnyToStr(this.getPagenameForIndex(i));
 var PS = page._cfwSendAPI("getPageState", S);
 
 if((PS == 1 || PS == 2) && page.btNext.Enabled()==true) {
 S = AnyToStr(this.getPagenameForIndex(this.Index()));
 if(AnyToBool(NE(S, "")))
 page._cfwSendAPI("Jump", S);
 }
 }
 }
 
 page._hideNavigationMenue();

JavaScript.Name: JScr_UpdateIcons
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var i, S, sIsChapter;
 var c = AnyToInt(this.TreeViewItemCount());
 var x = 0;
 for(var st = x; st < c; st++)
 {
 sIsChapter = AnyToStr(this._IsChapter(st));
 var state=0;
 if(sIsChapter == '1')
 {
 var y=this.getChildrenCount(st);
 if(y>0)
 { 
 
 state = this._checkChapterState(this.getPagenameForIndex(st));
 if(state==2)
 this.setCSSImageForIndex(st,"visited");
 else
 {
 if(page.PrjSettingsObj._NavigationSetting() == 0)
 this.setCSSImageForIndex(st,"visited"); 
 }
 }
 
 
 }
 else
 {
 if(ops == 1)
 {
 S = AnyToStr(this.getPagenameForIndex(st));
 i = 2;
 var PS = page._cfwSendAPI("getPageState", S); 
 if(PS == 1 || PS == 2)
 {
 this.setCSSImageForIndex(st,"visited");
 
 if(AnyToBool(this._IsChapter(st+1))) 
 this.setCSSImageForIndex(st+1,"visited"); 
 }
 else
 this.removeCSSImageForIndex(st,"visited");
 if(gvCFW.PrjSettingsObj._NavigationSetting() == 0)
 this.setCSSImageForIndex(st,"free"); 
 }
 }
 }
 i = this.getIndexForPagename(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'));
 if(i == -1) i = 0;
 this.ItemIndex(i);

JavaScript.Name: JScr_checkChapter
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(this.getChildrenCount(ai)>0)
 {
 var x=0;
 var kcount=this.getChildrenCount(ai);
 var i=ai;
 var c=0;
 while(x<kcount)
 {
 x=x+1;
 i=i+1;
 var S = AnyToStr(this.getPagenameForIndex(i));
 if(AnyToBool( page._cfwSendAPI("getPageState", S)))
 c=c+1;
 }
 if(c==kcount)
 return(2);
 if(c>0)
 return(1);
 if(c==0)
 return(0);
 }
 else
 {
 return(0);
 }

JavaScript.ScriptParam: index, className
JavaScript.Name: JScr_setCSSImageForIndex

JavaScript.ScriptParam: sChapter, iIndex, extraInfo
JavaScript.Name: JScr__checkChapterState
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var x, sName, sState;
 var pagenamelist=[];
 var retnode=findPageInPageLib(sChapter,'TStdOrganization'); 
 if (retnode!=null){ 
 var x = retnode.getElementsByTagName('TIdeaPage');
 
 for (var i = 0; i < x.length; i++){
 pagenamelist.push(x[i].getAttribute('Name'));
 }
 } 
 var iMaxIndex=AnyToInt(this.TreeViewItemCount())-1;
 var iMaxLevel=this.getLevel(iIndex);
 
 
 while (iIndex<iMaxIndex){
 iIndex++;
 iLevel= this.getLevel(iIndex);
 
 
 if (iLevel<=iMaxLevel){
 iIndex=iMaxIndex;
 
 
 }else{
 if (this._IsChapter(iIndex)==0){
 sName=this.getPagenameForIndex(iIndex); 
 x=pagenamelist.indexOf(sName);
 if (x<0){
 pagenamelist.push(sName); 
 
 } 
 }
 }
 } 
 var iVisited=0;
 var iSolved=0;
 for (var i = 0; i < pagenamelist.length; i++){
 sName=pagenamelist[i];
 sState=page._cfwSendAPI("getPageState", sName);
 
 if(sState==4 || sState==6)
 iSolved=iSolved+2;
 if(sState==1 || sState==2)
 iVisited++;
 }
 
 
 if(AnyToBool(extraInfo))
 {
 var chapterState = pagenamelist.length + "," + iVisited;
 
 return(chapterState);
 }
 if(iSolved==AnyToInt(pagenamelist.length*2))
 return(3);
 if(iVisited==pagenamelist.length)
 return(2);
 else
 return(0);

JavaScript.Name: JScr__makeMainMenu
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(this._ChapterArray() == "")
 { 
 var sName, sCaption, iLevel ;
 var arrChapter=[];
 var iCount=AnyToInt(this.TreeViewItemCount());
 var x=0; 
 for(var iIndex=0; iIndex<iCount; iIndex++)
 {
 
 if(this._IsChapter(iIndex)=='1')
 {
 iLevel=this.getLevel(iIndex);
 if(iLevel==0)
 { 
 sName=this.getPagenameForIndex(iIndex);
 sCaption=getCaptionFromPageLib(sName,"TStdOrganization");
 sName=sCaption+";"+sName+";"+iIndex;
 arrChapter.push(sName);
 }
 } 
 }
 arrChapter=arrChapter.join("#");
 this._ChapterArray(arrChapter);
 }
 return(this._ChapterArray());

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnClick
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_isFBP')))
 {
 this.Enabled(true);
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 var param=0;
 }
 else
 {
 if(this._ShowMode()==0)
 {
 this._ShowMode(1);
 this.Caption(this.Beschriftung_2());
 var param=2;
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("sol");
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("answ");
 }
 else
 {
 this._ShowMode(0);
 this.Caption(this.Beschriftung_1());
 var param=1;
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("sol");
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("answ");
 }
 }
 page._cfwSendAPI('ExecuteFunctionOnComponents',page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'),'page','doShowSolution',param);

JavaScript.Name: JScr__checkEnabled
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if((AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_isTestPage'))||AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_isFBP')))&&AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_ShowLoesung')))
 { 
 this.Enabled(true);

 this._ShowMode(0);
 this.Caption(this.Beschriftung_1());
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("dis");
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("sol");
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("answ");
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","DisplayMode","",""),1)))
 this.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 }
 else
 {
 this.Enabled(false);
 this.cssDisplay("none");
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__checkEnabled
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(GetAuthorMode() == 1) {
 this.Enabled(false);
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 return;
 } 
 
 if(page.PrjSettingsObj._MainMenuPage() == "") {
 this.Enabled(false);
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 jQuery(page.Menu.obj).addClass("noHome");
 this.cssDisplay("none"); 
 }
 else
 jQuery(page.Menu.obj).addClass("hasHome");

JavaScript.Name: JScr__checkEnabled
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Sprechertext')!="")
 { 
 this.Enabled(true);
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("dis");
 page.GlossarText.HTMLText(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Sprechertext'));
 }
 else
 {
 if(AnyToBool(page._SpeakerTextMode())==true)
 page.GlossarText.HTMLText(" ");
 else
 { 
 this.Enabled(false);
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 }
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnClick
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var myAudio = document.getElementById(page.Name()+page.AP.Name()).getElementsByTagName("audio")[0]; 
 if(page._Volume() > 0)
 { 
 page.AP.Volume(0);
 page._Volume(0); 
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("off");
 myAudio.muted = true;
 }
 else 
 { 
 page.AP.Volume(100);
 page._Volume(100); 
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("off");
 myAudio.muted = false;
 }
 var tmpl=page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_TemplateTyp');
 if(tmpl==111)
 { 
 var vol = AnyToInt(page._Volume());
 page._cfwSendAPI('ExecuteFunctionOnComponents',page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'),'VideoPlayer','_setVolume',vol);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnClick
JavaScript.ScriptData:
this.Enabled(false);
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(GetAuthorMode(),1)))
 {
 hideCoverPanel();
 PreviewPage._showmessage();
 return;
 }
 showCoverPanel();
 
 if(page._PopUpMode()==true)
 {
 var N=page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name');
 if(N==page._PageHelp()||N==page._PageImp()||N==page._PageSitemap())
 { 
 page._disablePopUpMode();
 Jump(page._CallerPage());
 }
 else
 page._cfwSendAPI("PreviousPage");
 }
 else
 {




 page._cfwSendAPI("PreviousPage"); 
 }
 if(GetAuthorMode() == 2)
 setTimeout(hideCoverPanel, 200);
 else
 hideCoverPanel();

JavaScript.Name: JScr__checkEnabled
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(GetAuthorMode()==1){
 this.Enabled(false);
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 return;
 }
 
 if(AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI("IsPreviousPage")))
 {
 this.Enabled(true);
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("dis");
 }
 else
 {
 this.Enabled(false);
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnClick
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if((StrPos("act",this.cssClass()))>0)
 {
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("act");
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("pause"); 
 }
 else
 {
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("pause");
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("act");
 }

 var tmpl=page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_TemplateTyp');
 if(tmpl==1)
 {
 if(page.AP.State()==1||page.AP.State()==2) 
 page.AP.FVPPlayPause();
 else
 { 
 if(page.AP.State()==0)
 page.AP.Play();
 else
 return;
 } 
 if(AnyToBool(this._Pause())==false)
 this._Pause(true);
 else
 this._Pause(false);
 } 
 else
 {
 if(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','AudioFileName')!="")
 {

 page.AP.FVPPlayPause();
 }
 else page.AP.Filename("");
 }
 if(tmpl==111)
 { 
 page._cfwSendAPI('ExecuteFunctionOnComponents',page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'),'VideoPlayer','FVPPlayPause',[]); 
 page._cfwSendAPI('ExecuteFunctionOnComponents',page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'),'VideoPlayer','_finished',false);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__checkEnabled
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','AudioFileName')!="") 
 {
 this.Enabled(true);
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("dis");
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("act");
 page.AP.Filename(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','AudioFileName'));
 if(page._AudioPlayMode()==1||page._AudioPlayMode()==0)
 { 
 page.AP.Play();
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("act");
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("pause");
 }
 }
 else
 {
 page.AP.FVPStop();
 page.AP.Filename("");
 this.Enabled(false);
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("act");
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("pause");
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 }
 var tmpl=page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_TemplateTyp');
 if(tmpl==111)
 { 
 if(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_VideoFileName')!="")
 {
 this.Enabled(true);
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("dis");
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("act");
 }
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__endofAudio
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var tmpl = page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_TemplateTyp');
 if(tmpl!=1)
 {
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("act");
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("pause");
 
 }
 var tmpl=page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_TemplateTyp');
 if(tmpl==1)
 {
 if(page._AudioPlayMode()==0||page._AudioPlayMode()==1)
 { 
 var ai = page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_AudioInit');
 WriteToConsole("_AudioInit - "+ai);
 if(AnyToBool(ai)) 
 page._cfwSendAPI('ExecuteFunctionOnComponents',page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'),'page','dothenextstep','1');
 }
 }
 page._cfwSendAPI('ExecuteFunctionOnComponents',page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'),'page','_endOfAudio',true);
 
 var nav = page.PrjSettingsObj._NavigationSetting();
 if(nav == 2) {
 var i = AnyToInt(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_InteractionType'));
 
 if(i == 1) {
 
 if(AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_pageFinished')) == true) {
 
 page._cfwSendAPI('ExecuteFunctionOnComponents',page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'),'page','_newPage',false);
 page._enableNaviNext();
 }
 }
 
 if(i == 0) {
 
 page._cfwSendAPI('ExecuteFunctionOnComponents',page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'),'page','_newPage',false);
 page._cfwSendAPI("setPageState",page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name'),"2","","");
 page._enableNaviNext();
 }
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnClick
JavaScript.ScriptData:
this.Enabled(false);
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 
 if(GetAuthorMode()==1){
 PreviewPage._showmessage();
 return;
 }
 showCoverPanel(); 
 
 
 var sPage = page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Name','','','');
 var tmpl = page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','Template');
 var sTestMode = page._cfwSendAPI("getPageAttr","_Testmode","","","");

 
 if(AnyToBool(page.TestPoolObj._usePool())) {
 
 if(AnyToInt(sTestMode)!=0||sPage==page.TestPoolObj._TestStartPage()){
 page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','doCheckTest');
 
 sPage=page.TestPoolObj._GetNextFromPool(sPage);
 if (sPage==''){
 sPage=page.TestPoolObj._TestEndPage();
 
 }
 if (sPage!=''){
 page._cfwSendAPI("Jump", sPage);
 if(GetAuthorMode() == 2)
 setTimeout(hideCoverPanel, 200);
 else
 hideCoverPanel();
 return;
 } 
 }
 }
 
 
 
 if(tmpl == "StartseiteVar1" || tmpl == "Teststartseite" || AnyToInt(sTestMode) == 1 || tmpl == "TestEndeRS" || tmpl == "Testdetailauswertung" || sPage == page.PrjSettingsObj._MainMenuPage())
 {
 if(tmpl == "Teststartseite")
 gvCFW.TestPoolObj._ResetTest(sPage); 
 
 if(AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI("IsNextPage")))
 page._cfwSendAPI("NextPage");
 else
 {
 if(page.PrjSettingsObj._MainMenuPage() != "")
 page._cfwSendAPI("Jump", page.PrjSettingsObj._MainMenuPage()); 
 }
 }
 
 else {
 
 var n = page.PageTree._checkPageIndex(sPage);
 if(n == 1)
 page._cfwSendAPI("NextPage");
 else
 { 
 
 n = page.PageTree._checkNextPage(sPage);
 if(n == 1 && page.PrjSettingsObj._MainMenuPage() != "")
 page._cfwSendAPI("Jump", page.PrjSettingsObj._MainMenuPage());
 else
 {
 if(AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI("IsNextPage")))
 page._cfwSendAPI("NextPage");
 else
 {
 if(page.PrjSettingsObj._MainMenuPage() != "")
 page._cfwSendAPI("Jump", page.PrjSettingsObj._MainMenuPage()); 
 }
 }
 }
 }
 if(GetAuthorMode() == 2)
 setTimeout(hideCoverPanel, 200);
 else
 hideCoverPanel();

JavaScript.Name: JScr__checkEnabled
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(GetAuthorMode()==1){
 this.Enabled(false);
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 return;
 }
 
 var isNPg=0; 
 var sPage=page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_NextPage');
 if(sPage!="")
 {
 if(typeof(allPageName[sPage])!="undefined")
 isNPg=1;
 }
 if((AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI("IsNextPage"))||isNPg==1)&&(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_LastPage')==0))
 {
 this.Enabled(true);
 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("dis");
 
 var nav = page.PrjSettingsObj._NavigationSetting();
 if(nav == 2) 
 {
 if(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','AudioFileName')!="" && AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_newPage')))
 page._disableNaviNext();
 } 
 }
 else
 {
 if(page.PrjSettingsObj._MainMenuPage() == "") 
 { 
 this.Enabled(false);
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("dis");
 }
 }
 if((page._PopUpMode()==true)&&((page._cfwSendAPI('getPageAttr','_LastPage')==true)||(AnyToBool(NOT(page._cfwSendAPI("IsNextPage"))))))
 this.cssDisplay("none");
 else
 this.cssDisplay("inline-block");

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnClick
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(GetAuthorMode()==1)
 {
 PreviewPage._showmessage(1);
 return;
 }
 AudioStop();
 if(page._PopUpMode()==true)
 { 
 page._disablePopUpMode();
 Jump(page._CallerPage());
 }
 else
 page._cfwSendAPI("CloseProgram");

JavaScript.Name: JScr__getLocalProjectSettings
JavaScript.ScriptData:
this._ProjectName(page._CourseTitle());
 WriteToConsole("getLocalPrjSet - Projekt-Name: "+this._ProjectName());
 
 
 this._ProjectLogo(page._HeaderLogo());
 WriteToConsole("getLocalPrjSet - Projekt-Logo: "+this._ProjectLogo());
 

 WriteToConsole("getLocalPrjSet - Menü-Button verfügbar: "+AnyToInt(this._ShowContentsTable())); 

 this._MainMenuPage(page._PageMainMenu());
 WriteToConsole("getLocalPrjSet - Hauptmenüseite: "+this._MainMenuPage()); 
 

 WriteToConsole("getLocalPrjSet - Test - nötige Prozentzahl: "+AnyToInt(this._TestPercentToPass())); 


 WriteToConsole("getLocalPrjSet - Test - erst nach allen besuchten Seiten: "+AnyToInt(this._TestCourseCompleted())); 


 WriteToConsole("getLocalPrjSet - Test wiederholbar: "+AnyToInt(this._TestRepeatable())); 


 WriteToConsole("getLocalPrjSet - kein Test - alle Seiten müssen besucht werden: "+AnyToInt(this._NoTestCourseCompleted())); 


 
 WriteToConsole("getLocalPrjSet - Navi-Settings: "+AnyToInt(this._NavigationSetting())); 


 
 WriteToConsole("getLocalPrjSet - Seiten Zählweise: "+AnyToInt(this._ProgressPageCount())); 


 
 WriteToConsole("getLocalPrjSet - Restart-Setting: "+AnyToInt(this._RestartSetting())); 
 

 WriteToConsole("getLocalPrjSet - Intro vorhanden: "+AnyToInt(this._IntroAvailable()));

JavaScript.Name: JScr__loadCSSfiles
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var cssFiles = page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Projectsettings","CSSFile","","");
 cssFiles = cssFiles.split(",");
 for(var x = 0; x < cssFiles.length; x++)
 {
 LoadCSSfile(cssFiles[x]);
 }
 
 var cssMandantFiles = page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Projectsettings","MandantCSSFile","","");
 if(cssMandantFiles!="")
 { 
 cssFiles = cssMandantFiles.split(",");
 for(var x = 0; x < cssFiles.length; x++)
 {
 LoadCSSfile(cssFiles[x]);
 } 
 } 
 
 var cssProjectFiles = page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Projectsettings","ProjectCSSFile","","");
 if(cssProjectFiles!="")
 { 
 cssFiles = cssProjectFiles.split(",");
 for(var x = 0; x < cssFiles.length; x++)
 {
 LoadCSSfile(cssFiles[x]);
 } 
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__makePageStatus
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(p1.indexOf(';') > -1){
 this.attr_last_visited_page = p1.substr( p1.indexOf(';')+1 );
 p1 = p1.substr( 0, p1.indexOf(';') );
 }
 if (p1.charAt(p1.length-1)==','){
 p1=p1.substr(0, p1.length-1);
 }
 var ar = p1.split(',');
 var ar2 = [];
 var ps = '';
 for(var i=0; i < ar.length; i++){
 ps = ar[i];
 page._cfwSendAPI("setPageState",GetPageByIndexFromPageLibABS(i),ps);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__checkPageIndex
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var pagenamelist = page._PagenameList();
 var i = pagenamelist.indexOf(sPage);
 i++;


 if(i == pagenamelist.length-1)
 return 1;
 else
 return 0;

JavaScript.Name: JScr__getPagenameList
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var pagenamelist=[];
 var retnode=findPageInPageLib('Seiten','TStdOrganization'); 
 if (retnode!=null){ 
 var x = retnode.getElementsByTagName('TIdeaPage');
 for (var i = 0; i < x.length; i++){
 pagenamelist.push(x[i].getAttribute('Name'));
 }
 }
 pagenamelist.splice (pagenamelist.indexOf('CFW_S_Starter'), 1);
 pagenamelist.splice (pagenamelist.indexOf('CFW_S_Tablet'), 1);
 page._PagenameList(pagenamelist);
